column4: I was wondering is it smart to have windows 7 and Ubuntu on the same machine like dual booting. Am kind of scared I dont know if I will lose any files in both Operating system:( I hope it not bad
I was wondering is it smart to have windows 7 and Ubuntu on the same machine like dual booting. Am kind of scared I dont know if I will lose any files in both Operating system:( I hope it not bad
you can run them next to each other easaliy... install windows on partition 1 then ubuntu on partition 2 put all personal file one partition 3
Ya that were I missed up I put windows on Linux on the same partition am kind of scared:)
